refnamediv.refpurpose: create an abstract syntax in rtg from a concrete syntax in sdf2

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: For the given concrete syntax definition in the syntax definition formalism sdf2, the command sdf2rtg generates an abstract syntax definition in the rtg (regular tree grammar) language. This rtg defines the set of abstract syntax trees that will result from parsing text in the concrete syntax specified by the sdf2 definition.
